snippet.title: Guardians of the Santree - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Hi Guardians! We are thrilled to finally be launching our official release! Compared to the demo, the full version has added a lot of exciting content. If you are interested in this game, quickly gather your friends and embark on an adventure in Sanctree! Of course, we will continue to update the game in the future, striving to make the game better. 

Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2512930

"Guardians of the Sanctree" is a 2D hand-drawn co-op game featuring cooperative base-building, automation, exploration, and tower defense survival. Players lead as commanders in the avian military government, restoring Sanctree cities, defending against underground insectoid attacks, and establishing solid defenses.
